title: testscript_multianimal ERROR
body:
**Describe the bug** I am getting an error from testscript_multianimal as described below. The final error is a 'FileNotFoundError' for the 'm3v1mp4shortDLC_resnet_50_multi_mouseMar5shuffle1_5_full.pickle' file in the videos directory of the multi_mouse directory created by the testscript. **Desktop:** - OS: Mac Catalina (10.15) - Anaconda environment DLC-CPU - DeepLabCut Version 2.1.10.2 > ***This is also part of my question though (and might provide a quick answer to the 'bug'), so I will elaborate briefly here. I was previously using version 2.2b8 and achieving successful testscript_multianimal testing. However, in a recent query to the forum on dealing with variable numbers of animals across different videos/experiments (https://forum.image.sc/t/training-variable-number-of-animals-in-multi-animal/38374), I was advised that v2.2b8 was no longer supported and to use v2.1.10.2 instead; and that in v2.1.10.2, multianimal tracking was now supported. Is this true? If so, then I need to solve this error that I am getting with the testscript. But if not, and if I am supposed to be using v2.2b8, then I do not have this error.*** - DeepLabCut mode = multi-animal tracking **To Reproduce** 1. Activate DLC-CPU 2. Navigate to the cloned git deeplabcut/examples 3. run `pythonw testscript_multianimal.py` 4. See error:
TRACEBACK

```python Using snapshot-5 for model /Users/kperks/DeepLabCut/examples/multi_mouse-dlc_team-2021-03-05/dlc-models/iteration-0/multi_mouseMar5-trainset80shuffle1 Initializing ResNet Activating extracting of PAFs No video(s) were found. Please check your paths and/or 'video_type'. Video analyzed. Create video with all detections... Creating labeled video for m3v1mp4short Traceback (most recent call last): File "testscript_multianimal.py", line 135, in deeplabcut.create_video_with_all_detections(config_path, [new_video_path], scorer) File "/Users/kperks/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/utils/make_labeled_video.py", line 810, in create_video_with_all_detections with open(full_pickle, "rb") as file: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/Users/kperks/DeepLabCut/examples/multi_mouse-dlc_team-2021-03-05/videos/m3v1mp4shortDLC_resnet_50_multi_mouseMar5shuffle1_5_full.pickle' ```

**Expected behavior** Testscript completes **Additional context** I suppose the elaboration I wrote in the first section should have gone here, but if it was the obvious issue then I wanted to nip it in the bud earlier in the post. THANK YOU!
